== Vylathur (CT) (627797) ==

Vylathur (CT) is a town in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 5.26 sq. km. and harbouring 2289 households with total population of 10298 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 27 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 327 km. Male population is 4773 and female population is 5525. Scheduled Caste population is 747 and Scheduled Tribes population is 14. Census Location Code of the town is 627797<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 27 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 9 km.
